original_text: You know about the things that I did before, when I obeyed the Jewish rules. I caused very much trouble against God's church. I tried to destroy those people completely.
korean_text: 내가 이전에 유대교에 있을 때에 행한 일을 너희가 들었거니와 하나님의 교회를 심히 박해하여 멸하고

sentences.original_text: You know about the things that I did before
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내가 이전에 행한 일들을 안다

sentences.original_text: when I obeyed the Jewish rules
I caused very much trouble against God's church
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하나님의 교회에 큰 고통을 일으켰다

sentences.original_text: I tried to destroy those people completely
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 사람들을 완전히 파괴하려고 했다
